name: MiDoMi
description:
A robbery went down in the plaza and nobody seems to have a clue of what is going on. 

This is a game about language, about mixing up words together and trying to make a sense out of them, and about those words being musical notes.

Talk to everybody, tell them what they want to hear and you will eventually get to the bottom of this.

Controls: 

WASD-> Moveent

ERTYUIOP-> Musical Keyboard
